metadata.title: CVE-2019-13178 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: modules/luksbootkeyfile/main.py in Calamares versions 3.1 through 3.2.10has a race condition between the time when the LUKS encryption keyfile iscreated and when secure permissions are set.

criterions.comment: calamares: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
